statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, age FROM customers WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'F' ORDER BY city, state;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' AND state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE state = 'Texas' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, city, state FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M' AND age < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, DATE_FORMAT(birth_date, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_birth_date FROM customers WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY birth_date DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email, mc.campaign_name, mc.start_date, mc.end_date FROM customers c JOIN marketing_campaigns mc ON c.customer_id = mc.campaign_id WHERE mc.budget > 50000 ORDER BY mc.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%Men%' ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, SUM(p.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, campaign_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'female' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.price > 100 ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT i.customer_id, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date, c.name FROM interactions i LEFT JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
